name: @mozeyinedu/check
description: @mozeyinedu/check is a package that contains functions that check some conditions just to preserve time for other stuff

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'updated' && git push origin master
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run push && npm run publish

author: mozey
